projects.name: wanderer.moe
projects.description: Website hosting 'assets' from the game Genshin Impact, used by over 500,000 people worldwide. It was built using SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, and Cloudflare Pages, and has its own API.

projects.name: roblox filter for discord
projects.description: Discord bot allowing users to implement 'Roblox-type' moderation on their Discord server using webhooks to mimic speaking as other users.

projects.name: discord custom stream status
projects.description: Easy-to-use self-bot that lets users set their status to streaming and allows for full customization of the stream name and URL to your liking.

projects.name: dromzeh.dev
projects.description: The website you are currently viewing, built with SvelteKit and TailwindCSS and hosted with Cloudflare Pages. It also has its own API used in the /posts section.
